org.concordion.ext

Class LoggingFormatterExtension

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.LoggingFormatterExtension
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtension

    public class LoggingFormatterExtension
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.concordion.api.extension.ConcordionExtension
    Formats the footer of the Concordion specification to show a link to the log file that has been created for this test.

    By default this link leads to a log file viewer which attempts to format the log file for easier reading. For the log file viewer to work correctly the log file must contain the log level, if not switching the viewer off is advised.

      • setUseLogFileViewer

        public LoggingFormatterExtension setUseLogFileViewer(boolean useLogFileViewer)
        If set to true will show the an html based log file view of the classic test logs, this setting will be ignored if using the HTML Log.
        Parameters:
        useLogFileViewer - Value to set
        Returns:
        A self reference

      • registerListener

        public LoggingFormatterExtension registerListener(org.concordion.logback.LoggingListener logListener)
        Registers listeners for other extensions to listen in on log messages.

        NOTE: In order to correctly filter out log messages from other tests that might be running in parallel it automatically filters out log messages not originating from the current thread.

        Parameters:
        logListener - Log listener to register
        Returns:
        A self reference

      • setScreenshotTaker

        public LoggingFormatterExtension setScreenshotTaker(org.concordion.ext.ScreenshotTaker screenshotTaker)
        Set the screenshot taker to use when adding screenshot. If using the Logging extension to add screenshots then this does not need to be set.
        Parameters:
        screenshotTaker - Screenshot taker
        Returns:
        A self reference
